detail: Project with one or many tasks
Task to do - either automated by PC or manual
A task that involves researching or reading
A task that involves purchasing materials, shopping
actually doing the task (used for time logging)
Testing or inspecting the output of the task
Publishing the output of the task - this can be git commit, email spreadsheet or publish a book
Resources for tasks - can be money, time, people, objects, anything
A grouping to spilt tasks into areas
Skill or base knowledge needed to do a task
a category of skill types - see notes
a category of skill types - see notes
run a program (any languange) on PC, phone or database
Run a package or script (PLSQL or DDL) job on a database
software job to process data - generic
software job to map data from OLD_NAME to NEW_NAME
software job to procedurally generate stuff
